mapper.select:
SELECT count(1) FROM ( SELECT hct.order_id FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=1 INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hbt.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_borrow hb ON hbt.borrow_nid = hb.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid
GROUP BY hct.order_id ) t

SELECT SUM(account) FROM ( SELECT hbt1.account account FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=1 INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hbt.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_borrow hb ON hbt.borrow_nid = hb.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender hbt1 ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hbt1.nid
INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid
GROUP BY hct.order_id ) t

SELECT hcu.id id, hcu.coupon_user_code coupon_user_code, hct.order_id order_id, hct.attribute, hu.username username, hu.user_id user_id, hcc.coupon_code coupon_code, CASE WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 1 THEN '体验金' WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 2 THEN '加息券' WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 3 THEN '代金券' ELSE '加息券' END coupon_typeStr, hcc.coupon_type coupon_type,
CASE hcc.coupon_type WHEN 1 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(hcc.coupon_quota, 2), '元' ) WHEN 3 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(hcc.coupon_quota, 2), '元' ) ELSE CONCAT(hcc.coupon_quota, '%') END AS coupon_quota, CASE WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 1 THEN '手动发放' WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 2 THEN '活动发放' WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 3 THEN '会员礼包' ELSE '' END AS coupon_from, CASE WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 1 THEN hcu.content WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 2 THEN hal.title WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 3 THEN IF ( vi.vip_level = 1, "欢迎礼包", "升级礼包" ) ELSE '' END AS coupon_content,
hbt.borrow_nid borrow_nid, hbt1.account account, hbt.client AS operating_deck, CONCAT(hb.borrow_apr, '%') borrow_apr, CASE WHEN borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(hb.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(hb.borrow_period, '个月') END borrow_period, date_format( hct.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) order_date, hbt.recover_account_interest_wait recover_account_interest_wait, hcr.received_flg received_flg, (SELECT cr.received_flg FROM ht_coupon_recover cr WHERE cr.tender_id = hbt.nid ORDER BY cr.recover_period DESC LIMIT 1) AS received_flg_all FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=1 INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hbt.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_borrow hb ON hbt.borrow_nid = hb.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender hbt1 ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hbt1.nid INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid LEFT JOIN hyjf_user.ht_vip_auth va ON hcu.coupon_code = va.coupon_code LEFT JOIN hyjf_user.ht_vip_info vi ON va.vip_id = vi.id LEFT JOIN hyjf_market.ht_activity_list hal ON hcu.activity_id = hal.id
GROUP BY hct.order_id ORDER BY hct.id DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT hu.username username, hcu.coupon_code coupon_code, hcc.coupon_name coupon_name, hcu.coupon_user_code, hcc.content, CASE WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 1 THEN '体验金' WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 2 THEN '加息券' WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 3 THEN '代金券' ELSE '' END coupon_typeStr, hcc.coupon_type coupon_type, hcc.coupon_quota coupon_quota, FROM_UNIXTIME(hcu.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') end_time, hcc.coupon_system coupon_system, hcc.project_type project_type, CONCAT(hcc.coupon_profit_time,'天') coupon_profit_time, hcc.coupon_profit_time AS coupon_profit_time_orgin, hcc.repay_time_config, CASE WHEN hcc.tender_quota_type = 0 THEN '不限' WHEN hcc.tender_quota_type = 1 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(hcc.tender_quota_min,2), '元~', FORMAT(hcc.tender_quota_max,2), '元可用' ) WHEN hcc.tender_quota_type = 2 THEN CONCAT( '满', FORMAT(hcc.tender_quota,2), '元可用' ) WHEN hcc.tender_quota_type = 3 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(hcc.tender_quota,2), '元（含）内可用' ) ELSE '不限' END tender_quota, CASE WHEN hcc.project_expiration_type = 0 THEN '不限' WHEN hcc.project_expiration_type = 1 THEN CONCAT( '适用', hcc.project_expiration_length, '个月的项目' ) WHEN hcc.project_expiration_type = 2 THEN CONCAT( '适用', hcc.project_expiration_length_min, '个月~', hcc.project_expiration_length_max, '个月的项目' ) WHEN hcc.project_expiration_type = 3 THEN CONCAT( '适用≥', hcc.project_expiration_length, '个月的项目' ) WHEN hcc.project_expiration_type = 4 THEN CONCAT( '适用≤', hcc.project_expiration_length, '个月的项目' ) ELSE '不限' END project_expiration_type, CASE WHEN hcu.used_flag = 0 THEN '未使用' WHEN hcu.used_flag = 1 THEN '已使用' WHEN hcu.used_flag = 2 THEN '审核不通过' WHEN hcu.used_flag = 3 THEN '待审核' WHEN hcu.used_flag = 4 THEN '已失效' END used_flag, hcu.used_flag AS used_flag_orgin, CASE WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 1 THEN '手动发放' WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 2 THEN '活动发放' WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 3 THEN '会员礼包' ELSE '' END AS coupon_from, hcu.coupon_source coupon_content, -- CASE -- WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 1 THEN -- hcu.content -- WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 2 THEN -- hal.title -- WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 3 THEN -- IF(vi.vip_level=1,"欢迎礼包","升级礼包") -- ELSE -- '' -- END AS coupon_content, -- IF(hcu.add_user=040 ,'系统', ha.username) grant_way, ha.username grant_way, DATE_FORMAT(hcu.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') add_time, DATE_FORMAT(hcu.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') add_time_full, hbt.nid nid, hbt.borrow_nid borrow_nid, hbt.`status` borrow_tender_status, IFNULL(hbt.account,'0') account, CONCAT(hb.borrow_apr, '%') borrow_apr, hb.borrow_apr borrow_apr_original, CASE WHEN hb.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(hb.borrow_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(hb.borrow_period, '个月') END borrow_period, hb.borrow_period borrow_period_original, -- hb.name AS borrow_name, IF(hb.account <= hb.borrow_account_yes,'复审中','投标中') AS borrow_status, hb.borrow_style, hbs.`name` AS borrow_style_name, DATE_FORMAT( hbt.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) order_date, IFNULL(hbt1.account,'0') real_account, hbt.tender_type, hhp.plan_nid, hhp.lock_period, CASE WHEN hhp.borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(hhp.lock_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(hhp.lock_period, '个月') END lock_period_view, hhp.expect_apr, CONCAT(hhp.expect_apr, '%') expect_apr_view, hhp.borrow_style AS plan_style, hbss.`name` AS plan_style_name, hha.accede_account, hha.order_status, hcu.activity_id, hcu.content user_content, hcc.add_flag AS add_flg
FROM ht_coupon_user hcu LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_tender hct ON hcu.id = hct.coupon_grant_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid INNER JOIN hyjf_user.ht_user hu ON hcu.user_id = hu.user_id -- LEFT JOIN hyjf_config.ht_admin u ON hcu.update_user_id = u.id -- LEFT JOIN ht_activity_list hal ON hcu.activity_id = hal.id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow hb ON hbt.borrow_nid = hb.borrow_nid LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_plan hhp ON hbt.borrow_nid = hhp.plan_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style hbs ON hbs.nid = hb.borrow_style LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style hbss ON hbss.nid = hhp.borrow_style LEFT JOIN hyjf_config.ht_admin ha ON ha.id = hcu.create_user_id -- LEFT JOIN ht_vip_auth va ON hcu.coupon_code=va.coupon_code -- LEFT JOIN ht_vip_info vi ON va.vip_id=vi.id LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender hbt1 ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hbt1.nid LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_accede hha ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hha.accede_order_id

SELECT hbt.borrow_nid borrow_nid, CONCAT( '第', hcr.recover_period, '期' ) recover_period, FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.transfer_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) transfer_time_string, hcr.recover_account recover_interest, hcr.recover_yestime recover_yestime, FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.recover_yestime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) recover_yestimeString, hcr.recover_time recover_time, FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.recover_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) recover_time_string, FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.exp_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) exp_time, hcr.transfer_id transfer_id, hcr.recover_status recover_status, hcr.received_flg AS received_flg_origin FROM ht_coupon_user hcu INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_coupon_tender hct ON hcu.id = hct.coupon_grant_id INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hbt.nid = hcr.tender_id -- LEFT JOIN ht_param_name n ON n.name_class = 'COUPON_RECIVE_STATUS' -- AND hcr.received_flg = n.name_cd

SELECT hcu.id id, hcu.coupon_user_code coupon_user_code, hct.order_id order_id, hct.attribute, hu.username username, hu.user_id user_id, hcc.coupon_code coupon_code, CASE WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 1 THEN '体验金' WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 2 THEN '加息券' WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 3 THEN '代金券' ELSE '加息券' END coupon_typeStr, hcc.coupon_type coupon_type,
CASE hcc.coupon_type WHEN 1 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(hcc.coupon_quota, 2), '元' ) WHEN 3 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(hcc.coupon_quota, 2), '元' ) ELSE CONCAT(hcc.coupon_quota, '%') END AS coupon_quota, CASE WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 1 THEN '手动发放' WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 2 THEN '活动发放' WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 3 THEN '会员礼包' ELSE '' END coupon_source, CASE WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 1 THEN hcu.content WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 2 THEN hal.title WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 3 THEN IF ( vi.vip_level = 1, "欢迎礼包", "升级礼包" ) ELSE '' END as coupon_content, hbt.borrow_nid borrow_nid, hha.accede_account account, -- pa.`name` AS operating_deck, hbt.client operating_deck, CONCAT(hhp.expect_apr, '%') borrow_apr, CASE WHEN borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(hhp.lock_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(hhp.lock_period, '个月') END borrow_period, DATE_FORMAT( hct.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) order_date, hbt.recover_account_interest_wait recover_account_interest_wait, -- pa1.name received_flg, hcr.received_flg received_flg, -- (SELECT -- pa2.`name` -- FROM -- ht_coupon_recover cr -- INNER JOIN ht_param_name pa2 ON pa2.name_class = 'COUPON_RECIVE_STATUS' -- AND pa2.name_cd = cr.received_flg -- WHERE -- cr.tender_id = hbt.nid -- ORDER BY -- cr.recover_period desc -- LIMIT 1) AS received_flg_all hcr.received_flg AS received_flg_all FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=3 INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hbt.user_id = hu.user_id -- LEFT JOIN ht_param_name pa ON pa.name_class = 'CLIENT' -- AND pa.name_cd = hbt.client INNER JOIN ht_hjh_plan hhp ON hbt.borrow_nid = hhp.plan_nid LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_accede hha ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hha.accede_order_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid LEFT JOIN hyjf_user.ht_vip_auth va ON hcu.coupon_code = va.coupon_code LEFT JOIN hyjf_user.ht_vip_info vi ON va.vip_id = vi.id LEFT JOIN hyjf_market.ht_activity_list hal ON hcu.activity_id = hal.id -- INNER JOIN ht_param_name pa1 ON pa1.name_class = 'COUPON_RECIVE_STATUS' -- AND pa1.name_cd = hcr.received_flg
GROUP BY hct.order_id ORDER BY hct.id DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT hct.order_id FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=3 INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hbt.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_hjh_plan hhp ON hbt.borrow_nid = hhp.plan_nid INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid
GROUP BY hct.order_id ) t

SELECT SUM(account) FROM ( SELECT hha.accede_account account FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=3 INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hbt.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_hjh_plan hhp ON hbt.borrow_nid = hhp.plan_nid LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_accede hha ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hha.accede_order_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid
GROUP BY hct.order_id ) t

SELECT hu.username username, -- hcu.create_user_id username, hcu.coupon_user_code coupon_code, hcc.coupon_name coupon_name, hcu.coupon_user_code, hcc.content, CASE WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 1 THEN '体验金' WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 2 THEN '加息券' WHEN hcc.coupon_type = 3 THEN '代金券' ELSE '' END coupon_typeStr, hcc.coupon_type coupon_type, hcc.coupon_quota coupon_quota, FROM_UNIXTIME(hcu.end_time, '%Y-%m-%d') end_time, hcc.coupon_system coupon_system, hcc.project_type project_type, CONCAT(hcc.coupon_profit_time,'天') coupon_profit_time, hcc.coupon_profit_time AS coupon_profit_time_orgin, hcc.add_flag, hcc.repay_time_config, CASE WHEN hcc.tender_quota_type = 0 THEN '不限' WHEN hcc.tender_quota_type = 1 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(hcc.tender_quota_min,2), '元~', FORMAT(hcc.tender_quota_max,2), '元可用' ) WHEN hcc.tender_quota_type = 2 THEN CONCAT( '满', FORMAT(hcc.tender_quota,2), '元可用' ) WHEN hcc.tender_quota_type = 3 THEN CONCAT( FORMAT(hcc.tender_quota,2), '元（含）内可用' ) ELSE '不限' END tender_quota, CASE WHEN hcc.project_expiration_type = 0 THEN '不限' WHEN hcc.project_expiration_type = 1 THEN CONCAT( '适用', hcc.project_expiration_length, '个月的项目' ) WHEN hcc.project_expiration_type = 2 THEN CONCAT( '适用', hcc.project_expiration_length_min, '个月~', hcc.project_expiration_length_max, '个月的项目' ) WHEN hcc.project_expiration_type = 3 THEN CONCAT( '适用≥', hcc.project_expiration_length, '个月的项目' ) WHEN hcc.project_expiration_type = 4 THEN CONCAT( '适用≤', hcc.project_expiration_length, '个月的项目' ) ELSE '不限' END project_expiration_type, CASE WHEN hcu.used_flag = 0 THEN '未使用' WHEN hcu.used_flag = 1 THEN '已使用' WHEN hcu.used_flag = 2 THEN '审核不通过' WHEN hcu.used_flag = 3 THEN '待审核' WHEN hcu.used_flag = 4 THEN '已失效' END used_flag, hcu.used_flag AS used_flag_orgin, CASE WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 1 THEN '手动发放' WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 2 THEN '活动发放' WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 3 THEN '会员礼包' ELSE '' END AS coupon_from, -- CASE -- WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 1 THEN -- hcu.content -- WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 2 THEN -- hal.title -- WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 3 THEN -- IF(vi.vip_level=1,"欢迎礼包","升级礼包") -- ELSE -- '' -- END AS coupon_content, hcu.coupon_source coupon_content, -- IF(hcu.add_user=040 ,'系统', ha.username) grant_way, hcu.create_user_id grant_way, DATE_FORMAT(hcu.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') add_time, DATE_FORMAT(hcu.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') add_time_full, hbt.nid nid, hbt.borrow_nid borrow_nid, hbt.`status` borrow_tender_status, IFNULL(hbt.account,'0') account, CONCAT(hhp.expect_apr, '%') borrow_apr, hhp.expect_apr borrow_apr_original, CASE WHEN borrow_style = 'endday' THEN CONCAT(hhp.lock_period, '天') ELSE CONCAT(hhp.lock_period, '个月') END borrow_period, hhp.lock_period borrow_period_original, hhp.plan_name AS borrow_name, hhp.borrow_style, hbs.`name` AS borrow_style_name, DATE_FORMAT( hbt.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) order_date, IFNULL(hha.accede_account,'0') real_account, hbt.tender_type, hcu.activity_id activity_id
FROM ht_coupon_user hcu INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_tender hct ON hcu.id = hct.coupon_grant_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hcu.user_id = hu.user_id -- LEFT JOIN ht_activity_list hal ON hcu.activity_id = hal.id INNER JOIN ht_hjh_plan hhp ON hbt.borrow_nid = hhp.plan_nid LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_style hbs ON hbs.nid = hhp.borrow_style -- LEFT JOIN ht_admin ha ON hcu.add_user = ha.id -- LEFT JOIN ht_vip_auth va ON hcu.coupon_code=va.coupon_code -- LEFT JOIN ht_vip_info vi ON va.vip_id=vi.id LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_accede hha ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hha.accede_order_id

SELECT hbt.borrow_nid borrow_nid, CONCAT( '第', hcr.recover_period, '期' ) recover_period, FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.transfer_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) transfer_time_string, hcr.recover_account recover_interest, hcr.recover_yestime recover_yestime, FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.recover_yestime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i' ) recover_yestimeString, hcr.recover_time recover_time, FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.recover_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) recover_time_string, FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.exp_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) exp_time, hcr.transfer_id transfer_id, hcr.recover_status recover_status, -- n.`name` received_flg, hcr.received_flg AS received_flg_origin FROM ht_coupon_user hcu INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_coupon_tender hct ON hcu.id = hct.coupon_grant_id INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hbt.nid = hcr.tender_id -- LEFT JOIN ht_param_name n ON n.name_class = 'COUPON_RECIVE_STATUS' -- AND hcr.received_flg = n.name_cd

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=1 INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hcu.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid
LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_debt_plan_accede hdpa ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hdpa.accede_order_id

SELECT hcu.id id, hcc.coupon_code coupon_code, CASE WHEN hcr.received_flg = 1 THEN '未回款' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 2 THEN '未领取' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 3 THEN '转账中' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 4 THEN '转账失败' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 5 THEN '已领取' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 6 THEN '已过期' ELSE '' END received_flg_string, CASE WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 1 THEN '手动发放' WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 2 THEN '活动发放' WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 3 THEN 'vip礼包' ELSE '' END coupon_source, hcc.content coupon_content, hcu.coupon_user_code coupon_user_code, hbt.nid nid, hu.username username, hcc.coupon_code coupon_code, hbt.borrow_nid borrow_nid, CONCAT('第',hcr.recover_period, '期') recover_period, hcr.recover_account recover_interest, hcr.transfer_id transfer_id, -- pa.name received_flg, hcr.received_flg received_flg, FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.recover_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) recover_time, IFNULL(hbten.account,'0.00') recover_capital, DATE_FORMAT( hbt.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) add_time
FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=1 INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hcu.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid -- INNER JOIN ht_param_name pa ON pa.name_class = 'COUPON_RECIVE_STATUS' -- AND pa.name_cd = hcr.received_flg LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender hbten ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hbten.nid
ORDER BY hcr.recover_time DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(hcr.recover_account),'0.00') FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=1 INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hcu.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender hbten ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hbten.nid

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(hbten.account),'0.00') FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=1 INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hcu.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender hbten ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hbten.nid

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=1 INNER JOIN ht_borrow hb ON hbt.borrow_nid = hb.borrow_nid INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hcu.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid

SELECT COUNT(hct.id) FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=1 INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hcu.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid

SELECT COUNT(hct.id) FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=3 INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hcu.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid

SELECT hcu.id id, hcc.coupon_code coupon_code, CASE WHEN hcr.received_flg = 1 THEN '未回款' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 2 THEN '未领取' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 3 THEN '转账中' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 4 THEN '转账失败' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 5 THEN '已领取' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 6 THEN '已过期' ELSE '' END received_flg_string, CASE WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 1 THEN '手动发放' WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 2 THEN '活动发放' WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 3 THEN 'vip礼包' ELSE '' END coupon_source, hcc.content coupon_content, hcu.coupon_user_code coupon_user_code, hbt.nid nid, hu.username username, hcc.coupon_code coupon_code, hbt.borrow_nid borrow_nid, CONCAT('第',hcr.recover_period, '期') recover_period, hcr.recover_account recover_interest, hcr.transfer_id transfer_id, -- pa.name received_flg, hcr.received_flg received_flg, FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.recover_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) recover_time, IFNULL(hha.accede_account,'0.00') recover_capital, DATE_FORMAT( hbt.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) add_time FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=3 INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hcu.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid -- INNER JOIN ht_param_name pa ON pa.name_class = 'COUPON_RECIVE_STATUS' AND pa.name_cd = hcr.received_flg
LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_accede hha ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hha.accede_order_id
ORDER BY hcr.recover_time DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(hcr.recover_account),'0.00') FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=3 INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hcu.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid -- INNER JOIN ht_param_name pa ON pa.name_class = 'COUPON_RECIVE_STATUS' AND pa.name_cd = hcr.received_flg
LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_borrow_tender hbten ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hbten.nid

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(hha.accede_account),'0.00') FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=3 INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hcu.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid -- INNER JOIN ht_param_name pa ON pa.name_class = 'COUPON_RECIVE_STATUS' AND pa.name_cd = hcr.received_flg
LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_accede hha ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hha.accede_order_id

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=3 INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hcu.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid

SELECT hcu.id id, hcc.coupon_code coupon_code, CASE WHEN hcr.received_flg = 1 THEN '未回款' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 2 THEN '未领取' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 3 THEN '转账中' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 4 THEN '转账失败' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 5 THEN '已领取' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 6 THEN '已过期' ELSE '' END received_flg_string, CASE WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 1 THEN '手动发放' WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 2 THEN '活动发放' WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 3 THEN 'vip礼包' ELSE '' END coupon_source, hcc.content coupon_content, hbt.nid nid, hhp.plan_name borrow_name, hhp.lock_period borrow_period, hu.username username, hui.truename truename, hu.mobile mobile, hac.chinapnr_usrcustid chinapnr_usrcustid, IFNULL(hha.accede_account,'0.00') recover_capital, hcu.coupon_user_code coupon_user_code, hbt.borrow_nid borrow_nid, CONCAT(hhp.expect_apr,'%') borrow_apr, hcr.recover_account recover_interest, hcc.coupon_quota coupon_quota, hcc.coupon_profit_time coupon_profit_time, date_format(hcr.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') hcr_add_time, FROM_UNIXTIME(hcr.recover_yestime,'%Y-%m-%d') recover_yestime, FROM_UNIXTIME(hcr.recover_time,'%Y-%m-%d') recover_time, hcr.recover_account recover_interest, -- pa.name received_flg, hcr.received_flg received_flg, DATE_FORMAT( hbt.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) add_time, IFNULL(hcr.transfer_id,'') transfer_id
FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=3 INNER JOIN ht_hjh_plan hhp ON hbt.borrow_nid = hhp.plan_nid INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hcu.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN hyjf_user.ht_user_info hui ON hui.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid -- INNER JOIN ht_param_name pa ON pa.name_class = 'COUPON_RECIVE_STATUS' AND pa.name_cd = hcr.received_flg LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_accede hha ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hha.accede_order_id LEFT JOIN hyjf_user.ht_account_chinapnr hac ON hac.user_id = hu.user_id
ORDER BY hcr.recover_time DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}

SELECT COUNT(hct.id) FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=3 INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hcu.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid

SELECT hcu.id id, hcc.coupon_code coupon_code, CASE WHEN hcr.received_flg = 1 THEN '未回款' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 2 THEN '未领取' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 3 THEN '转账中' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 4 THEN '转账失败' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 5 THEN '已领取' WHEN hcr.received_flg = 6 THEN '已过期' ELSE '' END received_flg_string, CASE WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 1 THEN '手动发放' WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 2 THEN '活动发放' WHEN hcu.coupon_source = 3 THEN 'vip礼包' ELSE '' END coupon_source, hcc.content coupon_content, hcu.coupon_user_code coupon_user_code, hbt.nid nid, hu.username username, hcc.coupon_code coupon_code, hbt.borrow_nid borrow_nid, CONCAT('第',hcr.recover_period, '期') recover_period, hcr.recover_account recover_interest, hcr.transfer_id transfer_id, -- pa.name received_flg, hcr.received_flg received_flg, FROM_UNIXTIME( hcr.recover_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) recover_time, IFNULL(hha.accede_account,'0.00') recover_capital, DATE_FORMAT( hbt.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) add_time FROM ht_coupon_tender hct INNER JOIN ht_coupon_user hcu ON hct.coupon_grant_id = hcu.id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_config hcc ON hcu.coupon_code = hcc.coupon_code INNER JOIN ht_borrow_tender_cpn hbt ON hct.order_id = hbt.nid AND hbt.tender_type=3 INNER JOIN ht_r_user hu ON hcu.user_id = hu.user_id INNER JOIN ht_coupon_recover hcr ON hcr.tender_id = hbt.nid -- INNER JOIN ht_param_name pa ON pa.name_class = 'COUPON_RECIVE_STATUS' AND pa.name_cd = hcr.received_flg
LEFT JOIN ht_coupon_real_tender hcrt ON hct.order_id=hcrt.coupon_tender_id LEFT JOIN ht_hjh_accede hha ON hcrt.real_tender_id=hha.accede_order_id
ORDER BY hcr.recover_time DESC
LIMIT #{limitStart} , #{limitEnd}
